projects.title: ‚≠ê VNList - Minecraft PvP Tierlist
projects.description: A Full-stack system featuring a Website, Backend, and a Discord Bot designed to rank Minecraft PvP players in Vietnam.

projects.title: ‚≠ê Home To School ‚Äî Educational graph visualization
projects.description: Educational graph visualization tool for learning shortest path algorithms. Beautiful UI, mobile-ready, featuring Dijkstra, BFS & DFS implementations.

projects.title: ‚ú® Group Tab Opener
projects.description: A modern Chrome extension to organize and open custom tab groups with one click.

projects.title: üéâ New Year Countdown
projects.description: A simple countdown timer to the New Year, built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. It displays the number of days, hours, minutes, and seconds remaining until the New Year.

projects.title: üé≤ XO Game
projects.description: A simple tic-tac-toe game built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Players can take turns placing Xs and Os on the board, and the game keeps track of the score. It's a fun and challenging game for all ages.
